(Icedemon, reparing the computers onboard the Ark would take a VERY 
VERY long time, seeing how there's nothing left of them.  All 
together, they've been hit by a charge or two, and several grenades 
over all the attacks.  Teletran 1 and 2 were hit by charges, not to 
mention the fires weren't put out, they burned out.  They would take 
a very long time to repair)
